Here are some resources we found helpful over the course of our project.

#### **Motivating Article**
[NY Post Worst Parking Spots](https://nypost.com/2021/11/18/these-are-the-worst-nyc-streets-for-getting-a-parking-ticket/): identifies streets in NYC incurring the most parking tickets.

#### **Mapping Packages**

[Geosphere Package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/geosphere/geosphere.pdf): includes documentation regarding the use of the `destPoint` function. 

[Map Overlay](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sp/vignettes/over.pdf): discusses how to use the `over` function to determine whether points are within a polygon.

[Reverse Geocoding](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/revgeo/revgeo.pdf): documentation on using the `revgeo` function to obtain a street address from a set of coordinates.

#### **Miscellaneous Resources**

[NY State Fire Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/NYFC2015UP/appendix-c-fire-hydrant-locations-and-distribution): describes the requirements for fire hydrant placing in NY state.
